description: 20x66mm caseless shotgun rounds, sublethal beanbag type.  Proprietary ammunition for Rivtech shotguns.  Being caseless rounds, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.
Handcrafted bootleg duplicates of Rivtech 20x66mm caseless flechette rounds.  Being caseless rounds, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.
Handcrafted bootleg duplicates of Rivtech 20x66mm caseless buckshot rounds.  Being caseless rounds, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.
Handcrafted bootleg duplicates of Rivtech 20x66mm caseless solid projectile rounds.  Being caseless rounds, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.
